channel.title: Anguish | Dev
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hSILR36.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3][ W ][/SIZE][/B]elcome to another one of my beloved developments. This will be a side project due to me playing 07 Scape, saying that I won't be updating it like once a week it will be constant just nothing too major all the time. The server type that I'm looking to create is an eco / pk, what I mean by this is; player killing won't be the only thing available to do but instead you can use skilling to help you survive in the wilderness e.g. basic food will be easy to obtain but if you wish to have advantages you can fish for rocktails / mantas. The fishing locations will be based in the wilderness so players can kill you if they want a "free" advantage (by this I mean loot your food without having to fish it). For the people who don't know the definition of Anguish; Anguish is physical / mental pain and suffering causing the person torment. The name fits in perfect (at least I think) with the server type; pking / eco.[/CENTER]
[B][SIZE=3][ F ][/SIZE][/B]eatures;
[ul][li]714+ items.[/li] [li]602+ animations & gfx.[/li] [li]Hyperion core.[/li] [li]Flawless combat system - re enhanced to the modern pkers needs.[/li] [li]Unbeatable switches.[/li] [li]Toggle options > x10 > hit marks etc.[/li] [li]Loyalty titles.[/li] [li]Low data usage client.[/li] [li]Clean & tidy server & client.[/li] [li]Revamped non-combat skills.[/li][/ul]
[center][B][SIZE=3][ M ][/SIZE][/B]edia;
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gNHDfdy.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3][ U ][/SIZE][/B]pdates; Yet to come.[/center]

item.title: Anguish | Dev
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Now, this is a good thread. I like this. I see that you’re trying to push the loading revisions. I can’t wait to see how this turns out from a standard 317. You should keep your update log on point, though. I see updates in the replies, but I don’t see them in the update log. Good luck with your server, I’ll be sure to follow this.

Read full topic

item.title: Anguish | Dev
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

KroniKz_:

Good luck! Was always fond of your work, I really like the banner and the name. In features, I saw “Loyalty Titles”, are you planning making custom ones like “Extreme Pker” etc?

I will probably keep the original ones, I might add a few custom ones like donator etc.

Update -

[ul][]NPC facing and a shop area has been added, It’s for those people who don’t want to spawn items yet wish to have a variety to choose from rather than just spawning sets.
[]Also the ability to pick what character models you wish to play in 377 and 602. (View picture by going to Rune-Server and searching Anguish.)[/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Anguish | Dev
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Tutorial:

I don’t understand why people even mention player killing as one of the main concepts of a server. The point of it just kills the overall feeling of a good server; good luck though!

That’s the hole point of a PK server. To player killing, if you want to skill and shit go to an eco server. I did mention that PKing isn’t the only thing available but it is going to be the main concentration.

Read full topic

[CENTER]

[SIZE=3][ W ][/SIZE]elcome to another one of my beloved developments. This will be a side project due to me playing 07 Scape, saying that I won’t be updating it like once a week it will be constant just nothing too major all the time. The server type that I’m looking to create is an eco / pk, what I mean by this is; player killing won’t be the only thing available to do but instead you can use skilling to help you survive in the wilderness e.g. basic food will be easy to obtain but if you wish to have advantages you can fish for rocktails / mantas. The fishing locations will be based in the wilderness so players can kill you if they want a “free” advantage (by this I mean loot your food without having to fish it). For the people who don’t know the definition of Anguish; Anguish is physical / mental pain and suffering causing the person torment. The name fits in perfect (at least I think) with the server type; pking / eco.[/CENTER]
